charges.charge_description: 18:371-Defendant did knowingly and unlawfully conspire to devise a scheme and artifice to defraud, through the United States mail in violation of 18:1341.

charges.charge_disposition: By Government's motion, COMPLAINT IS ORDERED DISMISSED WITHOUT PREJUDICE, SO ORDERED BY MAGISTRATE GOLD, DATED JUNE 3, 1993. (-1)
